profile:
Our landscape professionals have over 24 years of experience in all aspects of landscape design, installation and maintenance. We bring state-of-the-art equipment from bobcats to leaf blowers with us to every jobsite. We believe that our job is to make your yard an oasis for you to enjoy without the trouble of having to create or maintain it .

Lawn 'N' Order custom landscapes was founded by Jeff Vermette at age 17. As a student run operation we had lots to learn so with some college education and a vision the company is thriving today. We have added many services to create a company that can take care of all your outdoor projects. From landscaping to maintenance and continuous concrete borders to waterfalls we do it all. With our network of contractors specializing in all outdoor projects we can manage any project around your home!

We pride ourselves in the work we do and that is why over 80% or our work comes from referrals. We back it up with a one year warranty on all landscape and hardscape installations and 1 year on continuous concrete borders. We are always expanding our services and finding new and exciting products that will add some distinction to your yard! Such as our landscape lighting which ranges from low voltage to LED and even reliable solar lighting. We only use quality products in all our projects so you can spend your time enjoying your space instead of maintaining it.

We are fully certified, licensed and insured.
